# init(index:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(index value: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **value**: An index. Must be in the range `0 .. NSNotFound - 1`.

## Return Value

Initialized [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with `index`.

## Creating Index Sets

- **init(indexesIn:)**: Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index range.
- **init(indexSet:)**: Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexSet] object with an index set.
